mean_cn: n.创新，革新；新事物，新方法
mean_en: the introduction of new things, ideas or ways of doing something; a new idea, way of doing something, etc. that has been introduced or discovered
sentence: The age of innovation is upon us! Hurry up with my dinner!
sentence_trans: 我们正在步入一个创新的时代！赶快把我的晚餐做好端上来！
word_etyma: in进入 + nov新 + ation名词后缀 → innovation创新
